channel.title: MoparCraft Updates
channel.description:
First of all, I hope everyone had a nice Christmas. Now that the festive season is pretty much over for the most part, it's back to work in developing MoparCraft. We have quite a few changes that are being worked on:
[ol][li]The SSP - The Server Status Page can be found at http://www.moparcraft.net it is the same model as the MSCP status page, but with a few clear minecrafty changes. There may still be a few problems here and there that will be fixed shortly, but considering its live now it may as well be announced. Please post any issues on this topic and we will try to resolve them ASAP.[/li] [li]1.4 - We're working hard to push MoparCraft into version 1.4, previously there have been some serious issues with the upgrade but I intend to do a full debugging shortly. Hopefully this won't entail much downtime but if it does online players will be made aware.[/li][/ol]
I'm also aware some of our anticheat plugins are picking up players for the wrong reasons, while all of our detection plugins do not act automatically anyhow (So if you're picked up don't be alarmed, as a person will have to review it first) I'm going to be reconfiguring the detection in the near future.

item.title: MoparCraft Updates
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

kickingjamie:

NOBODY go in the end, you’ll be stuck on a obsidian platform relative to where you entered the end in the over world!!!

sounds like someone learned by experience

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft Updates
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I haven’t looked at the ender chests yet, which I stated at the bottom. I can’t really do anything about your items, I haven’t changed any configuration and the default world spawning is the same so if it works in general I’ll assume that’s a bug.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft Updates
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I logged in with no items, died to a spider and then spawned in the PVP world with items I should of had in the normal world. Also my ender chest emptied again.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft Updates
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’ve updated the server to 1.4.5, but the worldmap is being difficult so that will be sorted out tomorrow (hopefully). I’ve tested the permissions on multiple levels and everything appears to be working this time. As for the other bugs, I’ve fixed the separate inventories and I’ve also fixed the nether issue with the PVP world where it doesn’t work so you can now travel to the nether naturally.

I’ll look at the ender chests tomorrow, probably. Any issues now should just be permission based, so simply post them here and I’ll fix them.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft Updates
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Everybody, don’t rush(or bug bout the update) Tom lol, It took me 8 hours to figure out how to properly configure 3 plugins, Moparcraft has ~30 plugins so it will take sometime since those plugins all probably changed or worse, they are dependent on another plugin(aren’t stand alone) (also I am not on the same skill level has Tom so it might take him far far less time) lol

OT: Yeah, update, woo. lol.

Read full topic

First of all, I hope everyone had a nice Christmas. Now that the festive season is pretty much over for the most part, it’s back to work in developing MoparCraft. We have quite a few changes that are being worked on:
